des: "I've been trying to recreate coconut shrimp dipping sauce...this is close enough.  It's great for dipping shrimp. Amounts are approximate, adjust to suit your taste."
ins: Mix the sour cream, pina colada mix, crushed pineapple, and sugar together in a bowl, stirring to dissolve the sugar. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes to chill and blend the flavors.
